mapper.insert: insert into tb_alarm (user_seq, character_seq, alarm_type, alarm_text, relation_tb, target_seq, alarm_is_read, alarm_date) values (#{userSeq}, #{characterSeq}, #{alarmType}, #{alarmText}, #{relationTb}, #{targetSeq}, 0, now())
mapper.select: SELECT a.alarm_seq, a.user_seq, a.character_seq, a.alarm_type, a.alarm_text, a.relation_tb, CASE a.relation_tb WHEN 'tb_character' THEN (select nickname from tb_character where character_seq = a.target_seq) WHEN 'tb_storage' THEN (select nickname from tb_character where character_seq = (select character_seq from tb_storage where storage_seq = a.target_seq)) WHEN 'tb_achivement' THEN (select nickname from tb_character where character_seq = a.character_seq) END AS target_nickname, a.target_seq, a.alarm_is_read, a.alarm_date FROM tb_alarm a where alarm_seq=#{alarmSeq}

SELECT a.alarm_seq, a.user_seq, a.character_seq, a.alarm_type, a.alarm_text, a.relation_tb, CASE a.relation_tb WHEN 'tb_character' THEN (select nickname from tb_character where character_seq = a.target_seq) WHEN 'tb_storage' THEN (select nickname from tb_character where character_seq = (select character_seq from tb_storage where storage_seq = a.target_seq)) WHEN 'tb_achivement' THEN (select nickname from tb_character where character_seq = a.character_seq) END AS target_nickname, (SELECT file_path from tb_file f WHERE f.relation_tb = a.relation_tb AND f.relation_seq = a.target_seq) AS file_path, (SELECT file_name from tb_file f WHERE f.relation_tb = a.relation_tb AND f.relation_seq = a.target_seq) AS file_name, a.target_seq, a.alarm_is_read, a.alarm_date FROM tb_alarm a WHERE character_seq=#{characterSeq};

select.if: select nickname from tb_character where character_seq=#{targetSeq}
select storage_name from tb_storage where storage_seq=#{targetSeq}
select achievement_name from tb_achievement where achievement_seq=#{targetSeq}
